Event.name: Undergoing_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>In this scene, an <fen>Event</fen> occurs, and an <fen>Entity</fen> is affected by it.</def-root>

Arg.name: Entity
Arg.definition: <def-root>The thing which is affected by the <fen>Event</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Event
Arg.definition: <def-root>A change in the world which affects the <fen>Entity</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location at which the <fen>Entity</fen> undergoes the <fen>Event</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> for which the <fen>Entity</fen> undergoes the <fen>Event</fen>. The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. This often means that the <fen>Explanation</fen> causes the target's proposition, but not in all cases. </def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the event itself and any of its participants. </def-root>
